remarks.format: ## Remarks 此控制項支援藉由使用裝置範本集和內部分頁的樣板化的呈現。This control supports templated rendering by using device template sets and internal pagination. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 裝置篩選概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19(v=vs.100))並[分頁](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For more information, see [Device Filtering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19(v=vs.100)) and [Pagination](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將繫結陣列，並填滿。The following code example demonstrates how an array binds and fills a . 請注意，您可以透過程式設計方式設定並的屬性物件。Notice that you can programmatically set the and properties of the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要將資料來源繫結至清單，您必須先使用控制項的方法，以確保資料繫結。To bind a data source to a list, you must first use the control's method to ensure data binding. 資料來源可以是型別的，它可以是類型或。The data source can either be of type , or it can be of type . 如果資料來源的類型是，您可以使用欄位來指定要擷取的成員。If the data source is of type , you can use the field to specify which member to extract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目標裝置允許的位置，清單項目可以是未裝飾，或裝飾項目符號或數字。Where the target device permits, list items can be undecorated, or decorated with bullets or numbers. 列舉型別具有下列值：The enumeration has the following values: |名稱Name|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||不裝飾。No decoration.| ||以項目符號裝飾清單項目。List items are decorated with a bullet.| ||以編號裝飾清單項目。List items are decorated with a number.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以將清單變更為已編號的清單。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the list to a numbered list. 此屬性設定中的最後一行`Page_Load`方法。The property is set in the last line of the `Page_Load` method. 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分概觀。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileListSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/cs/Default.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MobileListSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/vb/Default.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用範本，來轉譯清單ASP.NET 的事件反昇機制透過呼叫事件處理常式。When you render a list by using templates, the event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET. 事件處理常式傳遞類型的引數，其中包含來源項目的資訊和產生事件之控制項的屬性。The event handler is passed an argument of type , which contains information about the source item and the property of the control that generated the event. 這可讓您呈現單一的清單項目使用多個關聯的互動。This allows you to render a single list item with multiple associated interactions. 預設呈現控制項提供基本的使用者介面 (UI)，可讓使用者可以按一下清單項目。On default rendering, the control provides a basic user interface (UI) that allows the user to click list items. 在回傳時，類型的引數呼叫事件處理常式，其中包含來源項目的相關資訊。On postback, the event handler is called with an argument of type , which contains information about the source item. 屬性，這個物件是`null`。The property of this object is `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件呼叫的方法，在清單中項目的狀態變更，並重新計算狀態總計。The following code example shows how to use the event to call a method that changes the status of an item in the list and recalculates the status totals. 這個範例是針對較大範例的一部分概觀。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileListSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileListSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目建立和資料繫結，此事件處理常式設定的屬性清單項目從任意的運算式。When an item in a is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions. 中的項目別的。An item in a is of type . 因為每個資料來源項目所繫結，會引發這個事件。This event is raised as each data source item is bound. 這是篩選或群組的項目中的最佳時機集合，利用或屬性。This is the best time to filter or group items in the collection, by using the or Property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以取得開始總計的狀態設定的清單。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to get the starting totals of status settings for the list. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分概觀。This code is part of a larger example for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值是`true`，值屬性用來顯示文字的超連結，而屬性用來指定的目標 URL。If the value of this property is `true`, the value of the property is used to display the text of the hyperlink, and the property is used to specify the target URL. 命令事件不會產生這些連結。Command events will not be generated for these links. 因此，當屬性設定為`true`、將不會呼叫方法，因為新的頁面載入透過 HTTP 呼叫。Thus, when the property is set to `true`, an method will not be called because a new page will be loaded through an HTTP call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 導致對伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更的追蹤 (Tracking)，以便它們能夠儲存於伺服器控制項的 物件。

span.span: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object.
